subject: Data
title: Climate Science: Modeling the Planet with Data
description: A micro-lesson that makes Climate Science: Modeling the Planet with Data usable.

hook.text: Predicting Earth's climate 50 years from now requires processing satellite data from every ocean and forest.

buildup.text: Climate models divide Earth into millions of grid cells, simulating temperature, wind, and moisture.

discovery.text: NASA's Earth Observing System collects 25 terabytes of satellite data daily for climate research.

twist.text: Climate denial often attacks the data, not the science. Data quality became a political battleground.

punchline.text: The planet's future depends on yesterday's data.
